title: 04/16/2021 - Hour 3 - Andrew Brandt
itunes:title: 04/16/2021 - Hour 3 - Andrew Brandt
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, talk about players from multiple NFL teams saying they will not attend voluntary workouts and what it means for the future of these workouts and what teams can do to make players show up. Andrew Brandt joins the show to share his thoughts on players skipping voluntary workouts and why the players are making a push on the matter after the CBA was signed, the dysfunction happening in the Eagles front office and more from around the NFL. Plus, the guys debate the legacy of NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
